lcap-gantt/data-source.description: The data source of the Gantt chart, the data set object or the logic of returning the data set

lcap-gantt/data-schema.description: The data type of each element of the collection type

lcap-gantt/text-field.description: Set the swimlane diagram text field

lcap-gantt/start-field.description: Set the swim lane chart start date field

lcap-gantt/duration-field.description: Set the swim lane chart duration field

lcap-gantt/progress-field.description: Set swim lane chart progress field

lcap-gantt/id-field.description: Set the swimlane map id field

lcap-gantt/parent-field.description: Set the parent field of the swim lane chart

lcap-gantt/color-field.description: Set swim lane chart data color field

lcap-gantt/icon-field.description: Set the data list icon field. Only png and jpg type image links are supported.

lcap-gantt/showToday.description: Set to display today's mark line
